channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The New York Times Is Terrified Of Mamdani, The Mayor It Helped Create
item.description: The New York Times helped create Zohran Mamdani, and now the paper is worried that he will do everything he says.

item.title: It Is Time to Be Done with Shutdowns
item.description: We’re five weeks into a government shutdown. It should be the last one.

item.title: Supreme Court Signals Skepticism About Trump’s ‘Emergency’ Tariffs
item.description: '[T]hese are not things that are thought of as Article II powers, [but] quintessential Article I powers,' said Justice Kagan.

item.title: Unite the Rails
item.description: When Leland Stanford hammered in the golden spike at Promontory Summit, Utah, connecting the Central Pacific Railroad and Union Pacific Railroad track...

item.title: Democrats brace for midterm civil war as 'old guard' leaders put on notice
item.description: Democratic socialist Zohran Mamdani's stunning win in New York's mayoral race blew up the internal fight that threatens to break apart the Democratic ...

item.title: Leftist Radicals In Office Are Much More Dangerous Than Fringe Radicals On Podcasts
item.description: The radicals Democrats label 'right-wing' are on podcasts. The left-wing radicals are in office.

item.title: Dems Try To Sabotage Push For Proof Of Citizenship To Vote
item.description: Leftist Groups Flood the EAC with comments in an effort to kill a call for documentary proof of U.S. citizenship to vote in U.S. elections.

item.title: The Nationalization of Elections Is Anti-American
item.description: Our Founding Fathers fought for our right not to care about who New Jersey elects as governor.

item.title: Tuesday's election wins embolden Democrats in shutdown fight over affordable health care
item.description: Senate Democrats are seizing on their party's widespread victories in Tuesday's elections as reason to continue their shutdown fight over health care ...

item.title: New York Times Coverage Avoids the Third Rails of Sex Trafficking
item.description: We must not ignore the role of illegal immigration and abortion.

item.title: A Visit to Sarasota’s Ringling Museum
item.description: It’s both whimsical and serious, though its website is awful. And, Governor DeSantis, don’t mess with its governance.

item.title: If Arctic Frost Perpetrators Don’t Go To Jail, Conservatives Will
item.description: To conservatives, Arctic Frost is a scandal. To Democrats, it’s their new baseline. And the only way to stop it is to punish them.

item.title: 'Not happening': Trump's personal plea to kill filibuster falls short among Senate Republicans
